ul.li: You gain a hipflask that has two swigs that refills at the start of every day.
Taking a swig from the flask will take a bonus action. Due to the strength of the booze in it you become dead drunk for an hour.
When you are drunk from drinking from this hipflask any attack roll made against you has disadvantage if you can see the attacker for as long as you're drunk.

sheet.description: You're a drunkard with a hipflask. The hipflask has two swigs in it. Drinking from it is a bonus action. Due to the strength of the booze in it you become dead drunk for an hour, when drunk from the hipflask any attack roll made against you has disadvantage if you can see the attacker.

description.p: This is a magical item that has 2 exclusive abilities one is to extend and push someone up to 15ft from the polearm or surface as a bonus action (There are 3 charges), and the other ability is to split in two for dual wielding combat.

Those who emulate the archetypal Battle Master employ martial techniques passed down through generations. To a Battle Master, combat is an academic field, sometimes including subjects beyond battle such as weaponsmithing and calligraphy. Not every fighter absorbs the lessons of history, theory, and artistry that are reflected in the Battle Master archetype, but those who do are well-rounded fighters of great skill and knowledge.

description.p: When you attack with the pushing polearm you can extend it into the attacked enemy pushing them upto 15ft away from you.
